Direct Entry Requirements:
(i) Two ‘A’ level passes including Economics in addition to UTME requirements.
(ii) NCE with passes at Merit level in relevant subjects.
(iii) ND/HND at Credit level in a related discipline

(v) Candidates with less than 5 points but not lower than 2 points with not more than one  “F” grade will be admitted to 100 level.

(vi) A University degree in a related discipline.
